title: Red pepper and coconut stir-fried rice

ingredients.item: 2 tsp Linghamâ€™s ginger, garlic & chilli sauce

instructions.step: Cook the rice in a large pan of boiling water for 20-25 minutes.
Meanwhile, spray a large frying pan with oil and gently cook the red peppers and ginger for 8 minutes until the peppers are tender.
Add the beans to the rice and cook for a further 4 minutes until both are tender, then drain well.
Stir the coconut into the peppers and cook for 2 minutes, then stir in the rice and beans, spinach and sauce and cook for a further couple of minutes until the spinach is just wilting.
